definitions.definition: Having two or more equally applicable meanings; capable of double or multiple interpretation.
Capable of being ascribed to different motives, or of signifying opposite feelings , purposes , or characters ; deserving to be suspected .
Uncertain, as an indication or sign.

main_definition: Having two or more equally applicable meanings; capable of double or multiple interpretation.
secondary_definitions: Capable of being ascribed to different motives, or of signifying opposite feelings , purposes , or characters ; deserving to be suspected .
Uncertain, as an indication or sign.
